grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 捜索【ソウサク】search (esp. for someone or something missing), manhunt, legally authorized search of a person, building, etc.
捜査【ソウサ】search (esp. in criminal investigations), investigation, inquiry, enquiry
博捜【ハクソウ】searching far and wide
kun reading compounds: 探す【さがす】to search (for something desired, needed), to look for, to search (for something lost), to seek (a suspect in a crime)
